content.question: Based on the data above, which of the following hypotheses about the future conditions in the Arctic is most plausible if the trend seen from 2011 to 2017 continues?

choices.label: The amount of carbon dioxide released from combustion of fossil fuels will decrease.
The population specialist species, such as polar bears, will increase.
The amount of solar energy radiated back into space will increase.

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Interpret experimental data and results in relation to a given hypothesis.
